name: My Resume Site
description: The site is a portfolio of frontend developer Demid Chebakov. It describes his hard and soft skills, as well as presents demonstration projects developed using various tools. The portfolio highlights the team's work experience, attention to detail, and commitment to continuous professional growth, thus demonstrating the developer's professionalism.

name: The Alpha Ecosystem TestWork
description: A demo web page created using Vite, React, and TypeScript. Displays a list of products. The main focus is on the visual representation of the goods, each of which is accompanied by an image, name and price. The products are presented in different categories, including clothing and electronics, and each product has a link to its own separate page.
